channel.title: AWS Deep Racer on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers
channel.description: Recent content in AWS Deep Racer on Beachgeek blog - a refuge for pineapple on pizza lovers

item.title: Innovate Machine Learning and AI - learn how to kick start your journey
item.description: On October 17th we have a free, online event covering several tracks on Machine Learning. Whether you are a complete beginner or seasoned data scientist, we have gentle introductions to deep dives. What I am most excited about however, is that we will have an AWS DeepRacer racing challenge. You will learn how to create your first reinforcement learning model that will race a virtual car, with prizes for the fastest times.
